# LRMF3

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/RoheLab/LRMF3/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/RoheLab/LRMF3/actions)
[![Codecov test coverage](https://codecov.io/gh/RoheLab/LRMF3/branch/main/graph/badge.svg)](https://app.codecov.io/gh/RoheLab/LRMF3?branch=main)
<!-- badges: end -->

`LRMF3` is a developer facing package designed to provide a standardized representation of low rank matrix factorization objects using the S3 object system.

## Installation

You can install the released version from CRAN with:

``` r
install.packages("LRMF3")
```


You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("RoheLab/LRMF3")
```
